data.name: Building & Managing Experimentation Programs by Yelp PM
data.summary:
Main takeaways:
- Learn how to build and manage experimentation programs from 0 to 1 by focusing on 5 pillars:
1) Establish baseline
2) Integrate technically
3) Boost trust in the platform
4) Shorter 'Build-Measure-Learn' cycle
5) Integrate culturally (Hardest of them all)
data.speakers:
Rohan Katyal



Rohan is a Product Manager with experience in software engineering and research. Currently, he works at Yelp as a Product Manager, evangelizing data-driven Product development by fostering a culture of experimentation that encourages teams to measure what matters, building the Yelp experimentation program from 0 to 1.
